element.name: The Type of Work-Related Injury, Death or Suspected Exposure
element.definition: The type of EMS crew member work-related injury, death, or suspected exposure related to the EMS response.

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Exposure-Body Fluid Contact to Broken Skin

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Exposure-Body Fluid Contact with Intact Skin

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Exposure-Body Fluid Contact with Mucosal Surface

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Exposure-Needle Stick with Body Fluid Injection

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Exposure-Needle Stick without Body Fluid Injection

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Violence-Physical Attack or Attempt to Attack

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Violence-Unwelcome Sexual Attention, Remarks, Jokes or Gestures

facet.name: enumeration
facet.annotation: Violence-Unwanted Touching of a Sexual Nature

asserts.assert: When The Type of Work-Related Injury, Death or Suspected Exposure has a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting), it should be empty.

When The Type of Work-Related Injury, Death or Suspected Exposure is empty, it should have a Not Value (Not Applicable, Not Recorded, or Not Reporting, if allowed for the element) or a Pertinent Negative (if allowed for the element), or it should be omitted (if the element is optional).
When The Type of Work-Related Injury, Death or Suspected Exposure has a Not Value, no other value should be recorded.
